Where: Opp SBI, 12th Main Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore (latlong: 12 58 14 N, 77 38 42 E)
park opposite domlur bda complex, domlur, Bangalore
Description: Large, nearly evergreen tree that grows up to 20 m or more in height, Madras Thorn has a broad crown (to 30 m across) and a short trunk (to 1 m thick) At the base of each leaf is normally found a pair of short, sharp spines, though some specimens are spineless. Leaves are deciduous but foliage is persistent, as the new leaves appear while the old ones are being shed
Name: Madras Thorn  Tree
